question: Which city will host the 2017 Whatashort Independent International Film Festival (WIIFF)?
explanation: The 3rd edition of Whatashort Independent International Film Festival (WIIFF) will be held at the Instituto Cervantes  in New Delhi  from  July 8-9, 2017  to promote short films from across the globe. More than 400 films participated from over 34 countries and more than 45 films will be screened this year. The significance of the festival lies in the very core idea of uplifting the indie and short film makers and their creations. It not only provides a unique platform to the shorter version of the motion picture but paves the way to the pinnacle it should achieve.
